meta_text: riefer Ritual for Realization in the Teachings of the Angel of Highest Bliss (Sambara), in the Tradition of Luipa; a Ritual for Reaching Gentle Voice (Manjushri) in His Combined Peaceful and Wrathful Forms; a Method for Freeing Someone from Curses, through the Practice of the Frightener (Bhairava); and Instructions for Making the Offering of the Golden Beverage, to Prevent Obstacles from Occurring for the King_KLONG RDOL BLA MA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG (1719-1794)
